title: Five-Star Switzerland Alpine Elegance with In-House Cinema in the Stylish Ski Village of Gstaad
description:
Early 20th-century grandeur meets contemporary style at Le Grand Bellevue, perched amid beautifully manicured parkland in the captivating alpine setting of Gstaad and ranked in the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor. Ensconce yourself in sumptuous textiles, eclectic furnishings and effortlessly elegant interiors as the hotel's classic buttercup-yellow façade and exquisite Murano glass chandelier anchoring the central stairwell invite you to unwind in Swiss sophistication. Each of the 57 charming rooms redefines a stylish and relaxed country-house ambience, with stunning mountain and garden panoramas sure to delight even the most seasoned ski-lovers. Visiting in the summer months? Make use of the brand-new padel club or hire an e-bike and explore the surroundings on two wheels (charges apply).

Take advantage of second-to-none service and an outstanding array of amenities, including international cuisine at gastronomic restaurant LEONARD's, Swiss classics in the log-cabin restaurant Le Petit Chalet, delicacies from the Sushi Bar or signature cocktails in the Art Deco bar that could be straight out of a Wes Anderson film. The hotel’s standout feature (besides its in-house cinema) is Le Grand Spa: a 3,000 sqm, state-of-the-art wellness facility, with eight saunas and hammams, a yoga and pilates studio, jacuzzi and indoor and outdoor pools set against a breathtaking mountain backdrop.
